Title: Healing with Whole Foods.
Subtitle: Asian Traditions and Modern Nutrition.
Authors: Paul Pitchford.
Categories: Health & Fitness.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=GddLDwAAQBAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&edge=curl&source=gbs_api.
Description: A guide to health, diet, alternative medicine, and natural food presentation teaches readers how to apply Chinese medicine and the five-element theory to a contemporary diet and treat illness and nervous disorders through food choices..
